meanings.definition: The quality of being made by hand.
meanings.sent1: Her handcraftsmanship in knitting was evident in the intricate patterns she created.
meanings.sent2: The artist's handcraftsmanship in sculpting the clay figures was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent3: The handcraftsmanship of the chef in preparing the meal made it taste even better.
meanings.sent4: The handcraftsmanship of the tailor in stitching the dress together was like watching a dance.
meanings.sent5: The handcraftsmanship of the carpenter in carving the wooden chair was a work of art.

meanings.definition: The skill of making things by hand.
meanings.sent1: His handcraftsmanship in woodworking allowed him to create beautiful furniture.
meanings.sent2: The handcraftsmanship of the potter was evident in the delicate pottery she crafted.
meanings.sent3: The handcraftsmanship of the mechanic in fixing the car was impressive.
meanings.sent4: Her handcraftsmanship in jewelry making was like watching magic unfold.
meanings.sent5: The handcraftsmanship of the shoemaker in crafting leather shoes was unmatched.
